article: the european union , angered by an israeli boycott of its mideast envoy because he met with yasser arafat , may respond in kind by stopping contacts with israeli leaders , an eu official said wednesday .
abstract: eu may turn away israeli officials in response to israeli boycott of foreign leaders who meet arafat
